name: GEA of Texas
tag_list: automation-distributor, industrial-automation-components, industrial-automation-solutions, industrial-automation, industrial-control-products, industrial-sensors, industrial-motion-systems, industrial-plc, industrial-contactors, industrial-relays, houston
overview: GEA of Texas, Inc. is a high-technology distributor of industrial automation components and solutions. Headquartered in Houston, Texas, we also have stocking sales locations in Dallas and Austin. We specialize in providing high quality industrial control products manufactured by internationally recognized companies to provide solutions to our customer’s application needs. Some of the products we work with are: sensors, motion systems, PLC’s, contactors, motor controls, temperature/process controllers, signal lights, relays, timers, counters and others. GEA has over 45 years of experience and leadership in industrial controls. Our superior technical knowledge and hands-on approach keeps us in touch with today’s growth in technology and the needs of industry.
